com.nifcloud.mbaas.core

クラス NCMBRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBBase
      • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBRole

  • public class NCMBRole
extends NCMBBase
    NCMBRole is used to retrieve and upload the role data
